sk1.name: Shrapnel
sk1.desc: Fires a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area.

sk2.name: Headshot
sk2.desc: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving a chance to deal extra damage and mini-stun. Headshot procs cannot be evaded.

sk3.name: Take Aim
sk3.desc: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

sk4.name: Assassinate
sk4.desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit, and after 1.7 seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.
